description: This is a truly decadent, creamy, sweet, indulgent fudge. Perfect to put in those little Christmas hampers or just to eat is a delicious treat.
name: Easy Caramel Fudge Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120g white chocolate, chopped into very small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Line a slice tray with baking paper. Mine is 7 cm x 26 cm.
Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over very low heat. Then add your golden syrup brown sugar and condensed milk.

HowToTip.tipText: It is very important to stir constantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir mixture over the very low heat until it slowly melts. Then slightly raise the temperature until the mixture comes to boil. Simmer for 10 minutes during it constantly, making sure it doesn't boil. This is very important to stir constantly.
Pour mixture into your lined tin and allow to cool. Refrigerate for three hours before cutting into squares. Depending on the size of the squares you should get 25 to 30 serves. Enjoy!
After stirring continuously for 10 minutes, remove from heat and stir in the very small pieces of white chocolate. Mix continually until no more chocolate lumps are visible.
